meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jared Ben Harris Dan Green Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #375.

td.p: Jared, an entertainment lawyer from San Jose, California
Ben Harris, originally from New York City
Dan Green, a teacher from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 3-day cash winnings total $24,800)

tr.td: 4-LETTER WORDS
FASHION
TRIVIA
WORLD HISTORY
MOVIE ANIMALS
"BLACK"

$2,500
the highest incorporated U.S. city')
